revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Altai |model=WA1011N-G |revision=(C1n) |asin=B009GI828Y |fcc_date=02/04/2013 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=access point,CPE |fcc_id=UCC-WA1011N-G,TWS-AP-100 |pwr_v=18 |pwr_amp=0.66 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EMI-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9725G6JB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=hg directional |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Altai Wireless Network |default_ssid_regex=^Altai Wireless Network$ |default_ip=192.168.1.20 |default_user=altai |default_pass=wag |oui=00:12:0E,00:19:BE |oui_eth=00:12:0E,00:19:BE }} {{TagLine|Altai C1n Super WiFi CPE/AP}} :[https://www.altaitechnologies.com/portfolio-item/c1n-c1an/ Product page]
"M01-"????"-X01" appears to be silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. Default settings are per the FCC manual. :Possible 00:12:0E or 00:19:BE OUI
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9344-BC2A WiSoC *RAM: ''Winbond'' W9725G6JB-25 / :(''EtronTech'' EM68A16CWQB-25H) *WLAN RF: Two [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=953 SE2576L] :(2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module)
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/add-altai-to-list-of-brands-for-dataentry/33206/2 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums]
